title: 101 Whiskies to Try Before You Die by Maestral
description:
Ian Buxton, "101 Whiskies to Try Before You Die"
English | 2010-12-01 | ISBN: 0755360834 | 224 pages | MOBI | 2 mb

A fun and accessible guide to completing an education in whiskey from a man who knows his hooch

Avoiding the deliberately obscure, the ridiculously limited, and the absurdly expensive, whiskey expert Ian Buxton has scoured the shelves of the world's whiskey warehouses to recommend an eclectic selection of old favorites, stellar newcomers, and mystifyingly unknown drams that simply have to be drunk. This witty, focused, and practical guide is not an awards list or a list of the 101 "Best" whiskies in the world in the opinion of some self-appointed whiskey guru. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s simply a guide to 101 whiskies that enthusiasts really must seek out and tryÃ¢â‚¬â€love them or hate themÃ¢â‚¬â€to complete their whiskey education. What's more, it's both practical and realistic as it cuts through the clutter, decodes the marketing hype, and gets straight to the point; whether from India or America, Sweden or Ireland, Japan or the hills, glens, and islands of ScotlandÃ¢â‚¬â€here are the 101 whiskies that every whiskey enthusiast needs to try.
